org.kepler.kar

Class SaveKAR

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.kar.SaveKAR

  • public class SaveKAR
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a gui independent class to be used for saving a KAR file to disk and to remote repositories.
    Author:
    Aaron Schultz
